name: SEIS Scheme
description: By enabling this, according to UK SEIS scheme site will ask some info about company to enterpreneur before start a project. Based on the information site will flag the company as SEIS/EIS. So investor can avail tax relief for projects with SEIS compliance. This will attract more investors. Please refer http://www.seis.co.uk
author: Agriya
parent: 3.Plugins For All Modules.Children.Plugins For Equity Module.Children
